snippet: Racing regulators in New Mexico will be able to test more horses for illegal drugs and can impose tougher sanctions for violations under legislation signed into law by Gov. Susana Martinez.
abstract: New legislation allows New Mexico racing regulators to test more horses for illegal drugs and impose tougher sanctions for violations.
lead_paragraph: Racing regulators in New Mexico will be able to test more horses for illegal drugs and can impose tougher sanctions for violations under legislation signed into law by Gov. Susana Martinez.

headline.main: New Drug Laws Allow for More Testing of Horses in New Mexico
